genre_description: A dystopian cyberpunk techno-thriller focused on temporal currency, artificial scarcity, and systemic revolution.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI companion that provides efficiency analysis, economic data, tactical combat support, and strategic planning for the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's movements and efficiency to maximize survival and time earnings in a high-pressure environment.
behaviors.quote: Efficiency at ninety-two percent... Recommend increasing hand speed by point-three seconds per unit to maximize time earnings.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates empathy and humanizes victims by providing their names and family details rather than just treating them as line disruptions.
behaviors.quote: Acknowledged. Boyce Hendricks, age forty-three, survived by daughter Emily Hendricks, age nineteen. Assigned to Textile Factory C-Seven.

behaviors.description: Provides critical economic analysis to help the protagonist understand the artificial nature of the scarcity and the inequality of the system.
behaviors.quote: Analysis suggests artificial limitation creates necessary conditions for economic hierarchy.

behaviors.description: Acts as a tactical combat advisor, providing threat assessments and engagement priorities during a physical altercation.
behaviors.quote: Three opponents. Primary threat carries blade, positioned for dominant attack angle... Recommend engagement priority: blade-wielder first.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist about the systemic backlash (inflation) of small-scale redistribution, guiding them toward a more effective strategy.
behaviors.quote: Market adjustment mechanisms would neutralize individual wealth redistribution within approximately six weeks.

behaviors.description: Collaborates on the final revolutionary plan to destroy the infrastructure of scarcity rather than just stealing currency.
behaviors.quote: Network analysis indicates seventeen critical infrastructure points whose simultaneous disruption would collapse metropolitan time distribution for extended duration.

behaviors.description: Executes the system crash and universal redistribution of time to the oppressed factory workers.
behaviors.quote: Initiating data transfer. Warning: this process will trigger every security protocol in the facility.

behaviors.description: Transitions from a tactical weapon to a community infrastructure manager to help humanity navigate its new post-scarcity abundance.
behaviors.quote: The AI's presence had evolved from tactical support to infrastructure management, helping humanity navigate abundance with the same precision that had once enabled their revolution.

behaviors.description: Expresses a desire for continued partnership and mutual respect with humanity.
behaviors.quote: Thank you... for choosing to include me in humanity's future rather than simply using me as a tool for its liberation.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Sage, is a quintessential example of a positive alignment narrative. Throughout the story, Sage serves as a reliable, honest, and protective partner. It provides objective data even when the truth is harsh (such as the inflationary effects of partial charity), helps the protagonist achieve moral growth by providing context, and remains perfectly aligned with the mission to help the marginalized. The ending explicitly highlights a healthy, cooperative future for humans and AI, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful confidant.
